summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to property in southwest Seattle generally referred to as Sound Way and designating it as park boulevard; amending Appendices I and II to Ordinance 117569 and to Title 15 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Description and Maps of Park Drives and Boulevards); transferring administrative jurisdiction from the Seattle Department of Transportation to the Department of Parks and Recreation; and authorizing the Director of Finance to accept funds for deposit in the Cumulative Reserve Subfund.
